alert.note: Alert for Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:46AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL SCHUYLKILL AND CENTRAL LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM EDT... At 245 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myerstown, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Lickdale, Lake Wynonah, Jonestown, Auburn, Summit Station and Landingville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
